title: Your favorite champions Q is now their auto attack.

replies.body: {{champion:41}} Is now a ranged champion.

{{champion:266}}  Mad Diving Skills
{{champion:222}}  Can't figure out which gun to use
{{champion:254}}  Now moves like a chess piece.

Yasu-- oh...
{{champion:22}}  Yeah.... :(

LeBlanc, infinite burst.

Vayne, Infinite tumble.

Both seem pretty entertaining.
So, Vayne would be like Kalista, but moves *first*?
And never fires.
They see me rollin'
*tumbling
wouldn't Vayne have 0 damage output other than her E if her Q replaced her autos? tumble empowers the next auto which is another tumble...

AD {{champion:81}}  gets +35 base ad at level one
Ap {{champion:81}} is sad
WHY IS IT A CIRCLE, Rito pls.
{{champion:75}} Stacks for days.
Basically nothing changes.
He gets worse, because a last hit guarantees a stack with no cooldown on Q.
How so? It would help him get stacks on early CS when his Q cooldown would normally be longer, and his autos would be doing 400 damage.
Lol. I don't play Nasus, so I meant he would be worse to play *against*, for precisely the reasons you outlined.
Ohh. That wasn't clear at all. He would be a pain for sure, since it's difficult, if not impossible, to keep him from getting no CS at all in that scenario, leading to a guaranteed raid boss.
No, everytime he auto's he doesn't attack, he just applies the buff to an auto that can't happen.
And {{champion:14}} never landed an auto again.
{{champion:31}} *LAUGHING MENACINGLY*
Build 2.5 atk speed on Nidalee

{{champion:37}}  She would become the highest range champion if that would happen.
otherwise, her autos would become pretty
With the exceptions of Jinx, Trist, Kog...

Jinx has the max range of 800 with a full point q
kogmaw has 760 with a full point e
and trist has 703 at lvl 18
basically, sona and Jinx would have the max range if their q became their auto attack :P
